summary: An unlucky-in-love graphic designer catches her boyfriend cheating on her and decides it's better to play the field than settle down.
cast: Ana Serradilla|José María de Tavira|Ana Layevska|Mónica Huarte|Miguel Rodarte|Itatí Cantoral|Juan Manuel Bernal|Pedro Damián|Julio Bracho|Carlos de la Mota|Alberto Guerra|Antonio Gaona|Cristina Michaus|Alicia Machado|Fernando Campo|Rodrigo Cachero|Miguel Ángel Fuentes|Miguel Couturier|Edgar Novoa|Eduardo España|Fernando Berzosa|Ricardo Reynaud|Mildred Motta|Julio Casado|Paquita la del Barrio|Fernando Manzano|Elizabeth Margain|Luis Villanueva|Priscilla Solorzano|Jeovani Mora|Ismael Romero|Natalia Shaenko|Rodrigo Sánchez|Mariachi Lucero de America|Javier H|Juan Ríos|Penelope Kaufer|Salvador Zerboni
title: Cansada de besar sapos
